Allergy.description: Risk of harmful or undesirable, physiological response which is unique to an individual and associated with exposure to a substance.

start.description: The date the allergy was diagnosed - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

stop.description: The date the allergy ended, if applicable - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter when the allergy was diagnosed - UUID

system.description: Terminology system of the Allergy code. RxNorm if this is a medication allergy, otherwise SNOMED-CT

allergy_type.description: Identify entry as an allergy or intolerance

category.description: Identify the category as drug, medication, food, or environment

reaction_1.description: Optional SNOMED code of the patients reaction

description_1.description: Optional description of the Reaction1 SNOMED code.

severity_1.description: Severity of the reaction: MILD, MODERATE, or SEVERE

reaction_2.description: Optional SNOMED code of the patients second reaction

description_2.description: Optional description of the Reaction2 SNOMED code.

severity_2.description: Severity of the second reaction: MILD, MODERATE, or SEVERE

CarePlan.description: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.

careplan_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the care plan - UUID.

start.description: The date the care plan was initiated - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

stop.description: The date the care plan ended, if applicable - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter when the care plan was initiated - UUID

reason_code.description: Diagnosis code from SNOMED-CT that this care plan addresses

Claim.description: A provider issued list of professional services and products which have been provided, or are to be provided, to a patient which is sent to an insurer for reimbursement.

claim_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the claim. UUID

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

provider_id.description: Foreign key to the Provider - UUID

primary_patient_insurance_id.description: Foreign key to the primary Payer. - UUID

secondary_patient_insurance_id.description: Foreign key to the secondary Payer. - UUID

diagnosis_1.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_2.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_3.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_4.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_5.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_6.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_7.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

diagnosis_8.description: SNOMED-CT code corresponding to a diagnosis related to the claim.

referring_provider_id.description: Foreign key to the Provider who made the referral. - UUID

appointment_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter. - UUID

current_illness_date.description: The date the patient experienced symptoms - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

service_date.description: The date of the services on the claim - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

supervising_provider_id.description: Foreign key to the supervising Provider. - UUID

status_1.description: Status of the claim from the Primary Insurance. BILLED or CLOSED

status_2.description: Status of the claim from the Secondary Insurance. BILLED or CLOSED

status_p.description: Status of the claim from the Patient. BILLED or CLOSED

outstanding_1.description: Total amount of money owed by Primary Insurance

outstanding_2.description: Total amount of money owed by Secondary Insurance

outstanding_p.description: Total amount of money owed by Patient

last_billed_date_1.description: Date the claim was sent to Primary Insurance - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

last_billed_date_2.description: Date the claim was sent to Secondary Insurance - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

last_billed_date_p.description: Date the claim was sent to the Patient - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

healthcare_claim_type_id_1.description: Type of claim: 1 is professional, 2 is institutional

healthcare_claim_type_id_2.description: Type of claim: 1 is professional, 2 is institutional

ClaimTransaction.description: A record of a clinical claim transaction.

claim_transaction_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the claim transaction. UUID

claim_id.description: Foreign key to the Claim - UUID.

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

claim_transaction_type.description: CHARGE: original line item. PAYMENT: payment made against a charge by an insurance company (aka Payer) or patient. ADJUSTMENT: change in the charge without a payment, made by an insurance company. TRANSFERIN and TRANSFEROUT: transfer of the balance from one insurance company to another, or to a patient.

amount.description: Dollar amount for a CHARGE or TRANSFERIN

method.description: Payment made by CASH, CHECK, ECHECK, COPAY, SYSTEM (adjustments without payment), or CC (credit card).

place_of_service.description: Foreign key to the Organization - UUID.

procedure_code.description: SNOMED-CT or other code (e.g. CVX for Vaccines) for the service

diagnosis_ref_1.description: Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options

diagnosis_ref_2.description: Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options

diagnosis_ref_3.description: Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options

diagnosis_ref_4.description: Number indicating which diagnosis code from the claim applies to this transaction, 1-8 are valid options

units.description: Dollar amount for a CHARGE or TRANSFERIN

notes.description: Description of the service or transaction

transfer_out_id.description: If the transaction is a TRANSFERIN, the Charge ID of the corresponding TRANSFEROUT row.

transfer_type.description: 1 if transferred to the primary insurance, 2 if transferred to the secondary insurance, or p if transferred to the patient.

payments.description: Dollar amount of a payment for a PAYMENT row.

adjustments.description: Dollar amount of an adjustment for an ADJUSTMENTS row.

transfers.description: Dollar amount of a transfer for a TRANSFERIN or TRANSFEROUT row.

outstanding.description: Dollar amount left unpaid after this transaction was applied.

appointment_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter - UUID

patient_insurance_id.description: Foreign key to the Payer Transitions table member ID - UUID

provider_id.description: Foreign key to the Provider. - UUID

supervising_provider_id.description: Foreign key to the supervising Provider. - UUID

Condition.description: A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

start.description: The date the condition was diagnosed - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

stop.description: The date the condition resolved, if applicable - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter when the condition was diagnosed - UUID

Device.description: A type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity. The device may be a medical or non-medical device.

start.description: The date and time the device was associated to the patient - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

stop.description: The date and time the device was removed, if applicable - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter when the device was associated - UUID

device_udi.description: Unique Device Identifier for the device.

Encounter.description: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

encounter_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the encounter - UUID.

start.description: The date and time the encounter started - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

stop.description: The date and time the encounter concluded - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

base_encounter_cost.description: The base cost of the encounter, not including any line item costs related to medications, immunizations, procedures, or other services

total_claim_cost.description: The total cost of the encounter, including all line items

payer_coverage.description: The amount of cost covered by the Payer

reason_code.description: Diagnosis code from SNOMED-CT, only if this encounter targeted a specific condition

ImagingStudy.description: Representation of the content produced in a DICOM imaging study. A study comprises a set of series, each of which includes a set of Service-Object Pair Instances (SOP Instances - images or other data) acquired or produced in a common context.  A series is of only one modality (e.g. X-ray, CT, MR, ultrasound), but a study may have multiple series of different modalities.

imaging_study_id.description: Non-unique identifier of the imaging study. An imaging study may have multiple rows - UUID.

date.description: The date and time the imaging study was conducted - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter where the imaging study was conducted - UUID

body_site_code.description: A SNOMED Body Structures code describing what part of the body the images in the series were taken of

modality_code.description: A DICOM-DCM code describing the method used to take the images

sop_code.description: A DICOM-SOP code describing the Subject-Object Pair (SOP) that constitutes the image

Immunization.description: Describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccine or a record of an immunization as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.

date.description: The date and time the imaging study was conducted - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

encounter.description: the Encounter where the immunization was administered

base_cost.description: The line item cost of the immunization

Medication.description: This resource is primarily used for the identification and definition of a medication for the purposes of prescribing, dispensing, and administering a medication as well as for making statements about medication use.

start.description: The date and time the medication was prescribed - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

stop.description: The date and time the prescription ended, if applicable - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

payer_id.description: Foreign key to the Payer. - UUID

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter where the medication was prescribed - UUID

base_cost.description: The line item cost of the medication

payer_coverage.description: The amount covered or reimbursed by the Payer

dispenses.description: The number of times the prescription was filled

total_cost.description: The total cost of the prescription, including all dispenses

reason_code.description: Diagnosis code from SNOMED-CT specifying why this medication was prescribed

Observation.description: Measurements and simple assertions made about a patient, device or other subject.

date.description: The date and time the imaging study was conducted - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter where the observation was performed - UUID

code.description: Observation or Lab code from LOINC

description.description: Description of the observation or lab

value.description: The recorded value of the observation

units.description: The units of measure for the value

observation_type.description: The datatype of Value: text or numeric

Organization.description: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action.  Includes companies, institutions, corporations, departments, community groups, healthcare practice groups, payer/insurer, etc.

organization_id.description: Primary key of the Organization - UUID

address.description: Organization's street address without commas or newlines

zip.description: Street address zip or postal code

revenue.description: The monetary revenue of the organization during the entire simulation

utilization.description: The number of Encounters performed by this Organization

patient_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the patient - UUID

payer_id.description: Foreign key to the Payer. - UUID

patient_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the patient - UUID

birth_date.description: The date the patient was born - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

death_date.description: The date the patient died - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

prefix.description: Name prefix, such as Mr., Mrs., Dr., etc.

last.description: Last or surname of the patient

suffix.description: Name suffix, such as PhD, MD, JD, etc.

marital.description: Marital Status. M is married, S is single. Currently no support for divorce (D) or widowing (W)

race.description: Description of the patient's primary race

ethnicity.description: Description of the patient's primary ethnicity

gender.description: Gender. M is male, F is female

birth_place.description: Name of the town where the patient was born

address.description: Patient's street address without commas or newlines

healthcare_expenses.description: The total lifetime cost of healthcare to the patient (i.e. what the patient paid)

healthcare_coverage.description: The total lifetime cost of healthcare services that were covered by Payers (i.e. what the insurance company paid)

patient_id.description: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the patient - UUID

member_id.description: Member ID for the Insurance Plan - UUID

payer_id.description: Foreign key to the Payer - UUID

secondary_payer_id.description: Foreign key to the Secondary Payer - UUID

plan_ownership.description: The owner of the insurance policy. Legal values: Guardian, Self, Spouse

owner_name.description: The name of the insurance policy owner

Payer.description: This resource provides the details about the payer.

payer_id.description: Primary key of the Payer (e.g. Insurance) - UUID

ownership.description: Owner of the Payer - GOVERNMENT or NO_INSURANCE

address.description: Payer's street address without commas or newlines

zip.description: Street address zip or postal code

amount_covered.description: The monetary amount paid to Organizations during the entire simulation

amount_uncovered.description: The monetary amount not paid to Organizations during the entire simulation, and covered out of pocket by patients

revenue.description: The monetary revenue of the Payer during the entire simulation

covered_encounters.description: The number of Encounters paid for by this Payer

uncovered_encounters.description: The number of Encounters not paid for by this Payer, and paid out of pocket by patients

covered_medications.description: The number of Medications paid for by this Payer

uncovered_medications.description: The number of Medications not paid for by this Payer, and paid out of pocket by patients

covered_procedures.description: The number of Procedures paid for by this Payer

uncovered_procedures.description: The number of Procedures not paid for by this Payer, and paid out of pocket by patients

covered_immunizations.description: The number of Immunizations paid for by this Payer

uncovered_immunizations.description: The number of Immunizations not paid for by this Payer, and paid out of pocket by patients

unique_customers.description: The number of unique patients enrolled with this Payer during the entire simulation

qols_avg.description: The average Quality of Life Scores (QOLS) for all patients enrolled with this Payer during the entire simulation

member_months.description: The total number of months that patients were enrolled with this Payer during the simulation and paid monthly premiums (if any)

Procedure.description: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive like long term services, counseling, or hypnotherapy.

start.description: The date and time the procedure was performed - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

stop.description: The date and time the procedure was completed, if applicable - Date (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm'Z')

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter where the procedure was performed - UUID

base_cost.description: The line item cost of the procedure

reason_code.description: Diagnosis code from SNOMED-CT specifying why this procedure was performed

provider_id.description: Primary key of the Provider/Clinician - UUID

organization.description: Foreign key to the Organization that employees this provider - UUID

name.description: First and last name of the Provider

gender.description: Gender. M is male, F is female

address.description: Provider's street address without commas or newlines

zip.description: Street address zip or postal code

encounters.description: The number of Encounters performed by this Provider

procedures.description: The number of Procedures performed by this Provider

Supply.description: A record of a supply for a medication, substance or device used in the healthcare setting.

date.description: The date the supplies were used - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

patient_id.description: Foreign key to the Patient - UUID.

encounter_id.description: Foreign key to the Encounter when the supplies were used - UUID

code.description: Code for the type of supply used, from SNOMED-CT
